import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ArrowLeftOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import SortableList, { SortableItem } from 'react-easy-sort' import {arrayMoveImmutable} from 'array-move' const ProductEdit = () => { const [ArrayList, setArrayList] = useState( [ 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', 'https://media.gq-magazine.co.uk/photos/5edfa087310483753e788e82/master/w_1920,c_limit/20200609-adidas-11.jpg', ] ) const onSortEnd = (oldIndex, newIndex) => { setArrayList((array) => arrayMoveImmutable(array, oldIndex, newIndex)) } return (
